string-array.name: tf
string-array.item: Android is an open-source operating system
Android developers require some tools and this requirement is satisfied by Android API
Java is the widely used language for Android development.
HAL does not provides an interface between device drivers
The entire android functionalities are available through the API.
The Android application is a bottom layer and all types of in-built applications
res/: It contains bitmap images, UI Strings and XML Layout
assets/: It contains a file that should be compiled into a .api file.
Activities are the part of the mobile app which the user can see and interact with.
Service is an Android component that runs in the background and acts independently.
